lines.text:
[Garret approaching them]
Who are you...?

[to five Arab terrorists in a restaurant]
I've come to deliver a warning from Mr. Lacombe.
Just you?

[cocky]
I don't see anyone else around. Do you? Mr Lacambe has sent me to tell you... camel jockeys... that if you fuck with him... he's gonna cut off your balls and stick 'em up your ass...
[tastes some of there food and spits it out, washes his fingers in the main terrorist's drink]
You actually eat this shit...?

[angry]
You're a dead man...

[smirking]
I'm not afraid to die... are you?

[angry]
No... Allah protects us...

[smiling almost laughing]
Well, in that case... this shouldn't hurt...
[slams his head into the table]
Why did you agree to see me?

So that you could carry a personal message back to that garlic-breath pig. I have moved south. I will stay south. Luganni is too weak to kick me out. And should you, he, or these Iranians you mention ever come into Vancouver, I will personally write Andre Lacombe's name on all your snowy graves... with piss.

[Lacombes assistant tries remove Garret, Garret floors him and pulls a shotgun that was not detected by Lacombes assistant]
It maybe your handwriting... but it will have to be his dick...
I'm so goddamn horny I could fuck mud.
[after killing a bunch of thugs]
Welcome to my world.
You! Fuck! Motherfuck!

[Hassan reaches for a pistol in the waistband of his pants, Garret blows him away with his shotgun. Hassan flys through the air and crashes through a window]
Drop dead.

[police arriving outside, Garret has Del tied into a chair hanging out of the window]
Now if you feel the need to piss your pants Del? just squeeze them cheeks... real tight...

[approaching Garret who is near Del at the window]
Ok Garret, we'll take it from here...
It's just about time anyway...

[walking after Garret who has started walking away from the window where Del's chair is rigged with a bomb]
What's that mean?... Garret...

[Del explodes, Chambers is shocked]
Damn it Garret... we wanted him alive...

[smiling]
Ain't life a bitch?
Running from your fear is more painful than facing it.
You've developed a sense of humor since we last met. How about self-control?
When necessary.

[pointing a gun at Luganni]
Arriverderci, asshole!
Where was my guys?
Hey, fat fuck!
[pulls open a van door to reveal two dead men]

[after Garrett watches him abuse his son all the way back to their house for losing a fight to a black kid, he walks up to the front door and rings the bell]
Well well well! And what the hell do you want, nigger lover?
[Garrett punches the guy in the nose through the screen on the storm door, and walks away]
